summary: Comprehensive testing of Wedding Gift Collection Pots app completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (15/15 tests passed). Frontend core functionality working with one critical UI overlay issue blocking cart drawer access.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns CSV data but test expected JSON parsing
minor_bugs.impact: Test parsing failed, but export functionality works

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepts cart button clicks
ui_bugs.details: Users cannot open cart drawer because 'Made with Emergent' badge blocks click interactions

integration_issues.issue: Cart items may not persist properly across navigation

passed_tests: Admin dashboard loads without spinner issues
Admin pots page loads successfully with 3 pots
Admin contributions page loads data properly
Donor form fields exist in cart drawer
Fee toggle and totals calculation components exist
Session creation and Razorpay order APIs working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical overlay issue: The 'Made with Emergent' badge is blocking user interactions with the floating cart button. Add proper z-index management or position adjustment to ensure cart drawer can be opened. Also verify cart localStorage persistence across page navigation.
